pull.title: BIP21: Update Address Types
pull.body: Added bech32 and bech32m address types to reflect the newer SegWit and Taproot addresses.

labels.name: Pending acceptance
labels.description: This BIP modification requires sign-off by the champion of the BIP being modified

events.message:
Update to include newer address types

Added bech32 and bech32m address types to reflect the newer SegWit and Taproot addresses.

Co-Authored-By: Reese Russell <reese.russell@ymail.com>

events.body:
Normally Final BIPs can't be changed, but I agree it seems like this is more of a clarification than a change.

@TheBlueMatt @tcatm what do you think?
I suppose this is okay. BIP-21 experienced alterations in the past which should not have occurred either. A better approach could involve replacing BIP-21 with a new one.
This seems potentially compatible with #1555. What do you think, @TheBlueMatt?
Yea, will include this commit there, assuming we move forward with #1555.
